data.description: Beautiful Well Maintained Custom Built Home w/ circular driveway in upscale neighborhood with lovely long range seasonal views. This elegant home has tons to offer w/ master suite, gourmet kitchen, dining, living & laundry room all on the main level. Upper level has 3 large bedrooms w/ loft overlooking foyer/living room area. Take the fun & entertainment to the basement & enjoy the large rec room w/ pool table, gym, family room, wet bar, custom built cabinet w/ kennels & large fish tank. Step outside & embrace nature on the wrap around porch or down by the pond & firepit w/ end of the road privacy. Detached two car garage w/ spacious handyman tool room & a bonus/office room upstairs. You will find lots of additional storage and extras with this home it is a must see! Several items of personal property being conveyed with home at no cost to the buyer.
